summary: This bill, the Impacts and Outcomes for Health Career Training Act, mandates a study and evaluation of the short, medium, and long-term effects of health profession opportunity grant demonstration projects, focusing on employment and earnings of participants. It amends Section 2008 of the Social Security Act, directing the Secretary to allocate at least 4% of the funding for these evaluations and continued study. The amendments made by the Act shall take effect on October 1, 2025.
